a.aria-label: Portland Public Schools' Mental Health Team Site

div.span: Portland Public Schools' Mental Health Team Site

span.span: All grades will be using Google Classroom or other digital platforms to complete assignments.
Please click the buttons below to access student learning information.
If a student is having technical issues with a district assigned Chromebook, please email: techhelp@portlandct.us

a.span: Click here to print the FFCRA Act form

span.br: It is the policy of the Portland Public Schools to provide equal opportunity for all students to achieve their maximum potential through the programs offered in all Portland schools regardless of race, color, age, creed, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, ancestry, national origin or disability.
